translations: v．呕吐，反胃：突然剧烈地将胃中物质排出口腔。
· He barfed after eating the spoiled food.
他吃了变质的食物后呕吐了。

sentences.sentence: He barfed all around the room.
sentences.translation: 他吐得房间里到处都是。

sentences.sentence: You barfed all over the back seat!
Seth: A blast? Jen got sick and barfed all over my jacket!
sentences.translation: 赛斯：好玩？阿花还吐得我整件夹克都是！
